title: Reading with Randos: A Grief Observed (Part 2)
description:
A new set of Randos join in on the reading in this second installment of our walk through C.S. Lewis' book "A Grief Observed".

Join the ConverZation.  Talk to PVK Randos and their ilk here:
https://discord.gg/zdjzsFu

Check out Paul Vanderklay's channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsD...
